hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="SC-$$" /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init login /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init build /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init start rsyslog2-jessie-small-metacloud /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'wget http://esb.metacentrum.cz/puppet-securitycloud.git/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' ############
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh securitycloud-cluster.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh securitycloud/tests/securitycloud-cluster.sh'
